rawText:
Jesima Parveen R.M
UI/UX Designer - 3 years of Experience
Phone: 6374652257
Email: jessyuiuxdesigner@gmail.com
Portfolio: behance.net/jesimaparveenrm
Linkedin: linkedin.com/in/jesimaparveenrm
PROFESSIONAL
EXPERIENCE
Designed dashboards, admin panels, and CRM systems for real estate,
eCommerce, and internal tools
Built scalable UI components aligned with brand and accessibility standards
Enhanced user journeys with wireframes, prototypes, and usability-driven design
Created visual assets like logos and templates for consistent cross-platform
design
Worked with cross-functional teams to deliver features efficiently

Implemented accessibility-focused design improvements

Conducted heuristic evaluations and introduced conversion-driven UI updates

Created responsive email templates improving user engagement
Developed a dynamic restaurant menu interface for mobile platforms
UI/UX Design Intern
Codsoft | Sep 2023-Oct 2023
Provided solutions for enhancing user experience on LinkedIn. 
Conducted UX case study on a cake customization app. 
Contributed to additional e-commerce projects. 
Freelance Designer
Freelancer | Jan 2023-Sep 2023
EDUCATION
Jansons Institute of Technology | GPA: 8.77
Bachelor of Engineering | 2019-2023
SKILLS
Tools: Figma, Adobe XD, Photoshop
UX: Wireframing, Prototyping, User Research, Personas, Usability Testing
Analysis: Google Analytics, A/B Testing, Heuristic Evaluation
Soft Skills: Empathy, Design Thinking, Collaboration, Communication, Leadership

CERTIFICATIONS

Google-Coursera

Analytical: Psychology | Human Behaviour | Philosophy | Cognitive Design | Reading UX Books

Linkedin

DECLARATION

DATE

SIGNATURE

Enhanced official company website layout and user flow. Conducted heuristic evaluations and introduced conversion-driven UI updates.

Designed mobile login/signup flows for apps ensuring seamless user experience. Created responsive email templates improving user engagement. Developed a dynamic restaurant menu interface for mobile platforms.
Provided solutions for enhancing user experience on LinkedIn. Conducted UX case study on a cake customization app. Contributed to additional e-commerce projects.
